Name: Xeno Last Stand
About the game: Play as a Knight basaed in a mid-evil setting, fight and kill monsters, boss's, gain loot such as food, weapons, Armor, upgrade items. Upgrade your gear to be able to take on the enemys in the next area, find books that tell a story and will take you on an adventure across the land, find chest's, friendly NPC's, and so much more.
